user.title: Vent Axia Integration for the Sentinel Kinetic Advance S MVHR
user.description: Enter your device's connection info. The WiFi Key and SSID can be found on the device label. More help: https://github.com/JosyBan/ventaxia_ha

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the Vent-Axia device. Please check the host, port, and network connection.
error.auth: The WiFi Key or identity is incorrect.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs.
